definition: variant of 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1]/camera
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Use the tape to fix the pin to the camera's lens.
sentences.chinese: 使用帶子把別針安裝到照像機的透鏡上。

sentences.english: Hz was shot with a spy camera that was placed inside the artist's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 赫茲在藝術家的嘴裏面安置的一架間諜照像機拍攝的。

sentences.english: After five yea of hard work, he'd saved enough money to buy a new camera.
sentences.chinese: 他辛費力苦積攢了五年的錢買了一架照像機。

sentences.english: Yes. The camera was handed in to the purser.
sentences.chinese: 是的，照像機已上交到事務長那裏了。

sentences.english: An Atlantic walrus bellows toward the camera near Igloolik, Nunavut, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 格盧利克附近，一頭大西洋海象衝着照像機吼叫。
